info.title: Print Queue

printer.queue.description: This Resource describes the items in a Printer Queue. The Properties "uri" and "status" are read only items that cannot be changed through this resource.

queue.description: The array of queue items for the printer.

status.description: The status of the queue item.

uri.description: The uri of the queue item (i.e. the actual file).
